Module.Name: HBM single value exposures
Module.Description: Human (bio)monitoring (HBM) population exposure estimates specified as (single value) percentile points of the exposure distribution.
Module.ShortDescription: Human (bio)monitoring (HBM) population exposure estimates specified as (single value) percentile points of the exposure distribution.
Module.DataDescription: Human (bio)monitoring (HBM) population exposure estimates specified as (single value) percentile points of the exposure distribution. For each HBM survey/study, exposure estimates for different biological matries (e.g. blood, urine) and substance can be reported via exposure sets.
